name: Pebble 2
description:
Pebble 2, the next game from the Pebble's Franchise is here.

Your mission is to defend again your village against the evil's pebbles. Discover the new fifty-five enemies in this survival Clicker.

Moreover, a new shop was construct in your village, think about feed yourself and recruit new members of Taga's Team to add a better strike force.

On your marks.. Ready? Click !

The project was made by

  • Florian Asencio : Program, Game Design, Game Art, Sound Design

Controls

Only the Left Click of your mouse.
